name: SocialB
description:
International award-winning digital marketing experts.
We help businesses of all sizes with their social media and digital marketing requirements through training and consultancy.
With a wealth of experience, the team at SocialB are extremely well placed to give your business guidance, training, and implementation of successful social media and digital marketing strategies.
Clients who have used SocialB's expertise range from start-up companies to blue chip organizations; including The Guardian, O2, ASDA, NHS, BBC, The Co-operative, Information Commissioners Office, TSB, Santander, Boots, Statoil, many large marketing agencies and others upon request.
We are experts in creating effective digital marketing strategies and social media training. Whether you are looking to improve your digital presence or would like to improve the knowledge and skills of your whole team, SocialB can help you.
READ MORE...

locations.address: Cambridge Business Lounge, Burleigh House, First Floor, 52 Burleigh Street
